= Downloads =

== Download nightly ==

Download the nightly build of Movico here. *Beware that this is an unfinished product!* The nightly build is also deployed on the demo site. So if you see additional features on the demo site, you can download a new nightly build to use them.

|| *Nightly build* ||
|| [http://46.21.168.93/php-movico/release/movico-nightly.zip movico-nightly.zip] ||

Check the [Installation] page for more information about how to install Movico on your server of choice.

== Download source ==

If you want to work with the current development state of the code go to the [Checkout Subversion Checkout] page.

= Demo =

The [http://46.21.168.93/php-movico Demo site] is updated each night to contain the latest trunk code. If you want to get to know Movico better, this is your playground!
